import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Set user role"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/users/{UserId}/role"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the role assignment for a user, which directly controls permissions, access to modules, and administrative capabilities.

**Prerequisites**
1. **UserId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users) to locate the user. Extract `Items[].UserId`.
2. **RoleId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/sites/roles](/docs/api/sites/list-roles) to list available roles. Extract `Items[].RoleId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List roles: [GET /api/v1.0/sites/roles](/docs/api/sites/list-roles) → select the target RoleId.
2. Search for the user: [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users) → extract UserId.
3. POST this endpoint with RoleId to update access.

**Minimal Required Fields**: RoleId (request body)

**Notes**: Role changes take effect immediately and may alter the user's visibility and administrative permissions.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"UserId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"User identifier.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"51c89694-ae9f-f011-8e61-6045bd7991ab"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request to set a user's role. Mirrors `Spark.Shared.Models.Requests.SetUserRoleRequest`.","properties":{"RoleId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"The role identifier to assign to the user."},"UpdateLockedState":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, the IsLocked value will be applied to the user."},"IsLocked":{"type":"boolean","description":"When UpdateLockedState is true, this determines whether the user account should be locked."}},"required":["RoleId"],"title":"SetUserRoleRequest"},"example":{"RoleId":"d4e5f6a7-8901-2345-6789-0abcdef12345"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
